name: Slimy Situation (Vybe)
description:
The Slimes have finally taken over the world. Unless a hero comes to destroy them once and for all! 

Hopefully you find a weapon before the slimes get you! 

Try to finish all the quests!

Tip: Chests are not interactable,  but must be damaged to open

Controls:

A/D - Left/Right;

Space - Jump;

Shift - Sprint;

E - Pickup Weapon / Skill

Left Click - Base Attack

1/2/3/4 - Skills
